description.en: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.

altTitles.ja: ギミック！

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.ja: どくどく

description.en: Freshman-year literature university student Yoshida moves into his new apartment next to an arts student from the same school. In his desire to start his life anew, what might a chance encounter with them bring?
description.fr: Yoshida, un étudiant en première année de littérature à l'université, emménage dans son nouvel appartement à côté d'une étudiante en arts de la même école. Dans son désir de recommencer sa vie, qu'est-ce qu'une rencontre fortuite avec eux pourrait apporter ?

title.en: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana

description.en:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?

altTitles.ja: 追放する側の物語
追放する側の物語 仲間を追放したらパーティーが弱体化したけど、世界一を目指します。

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Banisher Side After Banishing The Party Member - The Party Was Weakened, But We Aim To Be The Best In The World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Suru Gawa no Monogatari - Nakama wo Tsuihou Shitara Party ga Jakutaika Shitakedo, Sekaiichi wo Mezashimasu.

description.en:
"Exile" and you're weakened!? A "do-over" fantasy of a failed party!
"Stardust", an up-and-coming party, in order to aim even higher, expels Est, a “burden” of the party members.
But as a result, the party is weakened and Est is awakened!

In this "Serves You Right!" situation, a swordsman with zero motivation and zero pride rises to the occasion!
This is a story about the "Aftermath" of the "Side that Banished Him".

The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
description.zh: 队内关系最差的两人，竟因为饭拍视频霸榜热搜！年下小狼狗x清冷禁欲哥哥，CP粉直呼嗑到了！明明出道就不合，却被迫开启漫漫虚假营业路~

description.ru: Эта история о маленьком песце, который сунул свой любопытный носик туда куда не нужно было. И оказавшись запертым на космическом корабле песец...

altTitles.ja: 小さな紳士🐭
小さな紳士とサーナイト
Shall we dance??

description.en:
**Additional Links:**
- [Ch. 1 Alt Official Raw (pixiv)](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/92362634)
- [Ch. 2 Official Raw (pixiv)](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/97332683)

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

title.en: Together With the Gods of Music

description.en:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
description.ko:
재능은 없지만 가수로 성공하고 싶었던 프로듀서.
마지막 기회라고 생각했던 날 찾아온 죽음, 그러나 음악의 신들은 그를 외면하지 않았다.

-음악의 신들이 너를 버리지 않는다면, 정말 할 수 있겠나?

음악의 신들과 함께 변화는 시작되었다.

title.en: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru ~ Bannou Cheat Skill wo Getto Shite, Mezase Rakuraku Saikyou Slow Life!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『ガチャ』で追放された俺は、わがまま幼馴染を絶縁し覚醒する ～万能チートスキルをゲットして、目指せ楽々最強スローライフ！～

altTitles.en: After Being Banished For Having The Trash Skill "Gacha", I Came To My Senses And Broke Off Relations With My Selfish Childhood Friend

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.ja: ムシバミヒメ

description.en: In Toshiya Higashimoto's latest work Ai Tanaka, college student who wants to be a novelist, decides to share a room with Miu Yamaguchi who she met on the internet. Keep an your eyes on the roommates in this psychological horror.
description.ja: 【『テセウスの船』東元俊哉最新作！】小説家志望の大学生・田中愛は、募集サイトで知り合った山口美羽とルームシェアすることにしたのだが――。目が離せない、同居人サイコホラー。

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

title.en: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai

altTitles.ja: この恋を星には願わない

altTitles.en: There is No Love Wishing Upon a Star

description.en:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
description.ja: 幼い頃からいつも一緒に過ごしてきた冬葵と瑛莉と京。これまでずっと友達としての関係を続けてきたが、冬葵は瑛莉に対して友達以上の感情を抱いていた。そんなある日、３人は久々に遊園地に遊びにいくのだが、そこで冬葵は自身の恋が叶わぬものであると知ってしまい――

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.en: Leisurely Farmer in an Alternate Universe
Carefree Farmer in a Different Dimension

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere ka to Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en: A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

altTitles.ru: Военный раб, ставший мастером боевых искусств

description.en:
The Murim Warring States period is where only the strong survives. This is the war slave Cheong Gwang and Myeong-Wol’s Murim Survival Story.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ko:
강자만이 살아남는 무림전국시대.
전쟁노예 천광과 중원제일의 기생 명월의
무림 생존기를 그린 가족 무협 액션 드라마.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ru:
Главный герой - Чон Гван, будучи ребенком, попадает в военное рабство. Больше десяти лет он не видел своего отца и сестренку. Согласно уговору с преемником одной из сильнейших гильдий, он должен принести голову двадцати мастеров боевых искусств, и только тогда ему даруют свободу. Чон Гван жил мыслью о скором возвращении домой, однако... его обманули. Тогда он решает сбежать...

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)

altTitles.th: ตำนานผู้กล้าแห่งแหวน

altTitles.ja: 結婚指輪物語

altTitles.en: The Tale of the Wedding Rings

altTitles.de: The Tale of the Wedding Rings

description.en: Satou has been in love with his childhood friend and neighbour, Hime, ever since she and her grandfather appeared out of nowhere 10 years ago. Now a dazzling, yet mysterious high-school beauty, she makes it more and more difficult for him to confess his feelings. As the anniversary of their first meeting is nearing, will he muster up his courage to transform their friendship into something more? Or will an entirely different fate await this tightly bonded pair?
description.it: Sato è innamorato della sua amica d'infanzia e vicina di casa, Hime, da quando lei e suo nonno apparvero dal nulla dieci anni prima. Ora è un'affascinante, e misteriosa bellezza delle superiori, e questo rende molto più difficile per lui confessare i suoi sentimenti. Mentre l'anniversario del loro primo incontro si avvicina, raccoglierà il coraggio che gli serve per trasformare la loro amicizia in qualcosa di più? O un fato completamente differente questa coppia legatissima?
description.ru:
Сато — простой японский паренёк, который души не чает в своей подруге детства Химе. Так вышло, что Сато угодил прямиком в иной мир, где ему волею судьбы досталась роль повелителя колец. Женившись на давно любимой подруге детства, казалось бы, чего ещё желать, — но ни тут-то было! Зло не дремлет! И теперь, чтобы одолеть терзающую незнакомый ему мир напасть, ему предстоит женить на себе ещё четырех девиц из разных земель и рас, дабы вобрать в себя их силу и одолеть пробудившееся врага!  
Сможет ли наш повелитель колец исполнить свою роль и стать спасителем иного мира? Это нам и предстоит узнать!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/klotishue)
description.es-la: Satou ha estado enamorado de su vecina y amiga de la infancia, Himeno, desde que ella y su abuelo aparecieron de la nada en destello de luz hace 10 años. Ahora ella es una deslumbrante, misteriosa, y hermosa estudiante de secundaria y él desea llevar su relación al siguiente nivel, pero justo cuando está a punto de confesar sus sentimientos, ella le dice que debe irse. Él decide que no puede simplemente dejarla ir, así que va tras ella. Sin embargo encontrará algo inesperado, se ve inmerso en un mundo de magia, monstruos y ¡anillos de boda!
description.pt-br: Satou é apaixonado por sua amiga de infância e vizinha, Hime, desde que ela e o avô apareceram do nada há 10 anos. Agora uma deslumbrante, mas ainda misteriosa estudante, ela torna mais difícil para Satou confessar seus sentimentos. Com o convite de Hime para ir ao festival de verão, ele vai conseguir reunir coragem para transformar sua amizade em algo mais? Ou aguardará este casal um destino totalmente diferente?

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
Bocchi the Rock! anthology by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
**Cover**: [Chiba Sadoru](https://mangadex.org/author/d5f4317f-c206-4421-b87e-581d65d86c13)
**Illustrations**: [Matsuda Hikari](https://mangadex.org/author/d024d115-01fd-45d7-b92f-0af7434fd4c9/matsuda-hikari), [Uzaki Uso](https://mangadex.org/author/ed1f402e-0550-446a-b3d5-8cfee979104c), Instant, [Hoshi](https://mangadex.org/author/7f08c8d4-98a3-4fee-92ff-7f618c6ab63a), [Souma Hajime](https://mangadex.org/author/4f2c1169-ad59-444c-a0a9-dab195ee35f6), HOJI, Iwawa (イワワ)

10. Oomameda

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.ja: パンをナメるな！
Don't underestimate bread making

description.en: No education, no work experience, no friends. Muyu Uchiki is a nineteen-year-old girl who's been a shut-in for two years, she lives a self-indulgent life, but a turning point comes for her?! She gets a call from her aunt in Kamakura about helping out at her bakery.
description.ja:
引きこもり少女がパン屋の店長に！？

学歴・職歴・友達無しの少女 内木夢夢(うちきむゆ)は、2年間 家に引きこもって自堕落な生活を送っていた…しかし、そんな彼女に転機が訪れる――！！鎌倉に住む叔母からパン屋のお手伝いに呼ばれたのだ！ワケも分からないまま鎌倉に着いたむゆに待ち受けていたのはパン屋の店長代理としてお店で働くことで…！？

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

title.en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

altTitles.en: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight

description.en: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！

title.en: Genjitsu Sekai (Real) Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

altTitles.ja: 現実世界（リアル）でも幸せにしてくださいね？

altTitles.es-la: Sé feliz también en el mundo real, ¿de acuerdo?

altTitles.en: Be Happy in the Real World Too, Okay?

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Sekai Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?
Genjitsu Sekai (Real) Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

description.en:
High school student Machino, who longs for the 'love of destiny', encounters the dating simulation game 'Celestia'. Despite having maximized affection with all the heroines, she can't decide on just one, leading her to spend days of anguish unable to advance to the confession event. At that moment, an explosion along with a shooting star occurs in her house, and when she opens her eyes, she meets the main heroine of 'Celestia', Sofia....

"Machino... I always wanted to say it... I like you."

The otherworldly harem summoning romantic comedy begins with the highly affectionate heroines who have jumped into the real world!
description.es-la:
La estudiante de secundaria, Machino, que anhela el 'amor del destino', se encuentra con el juego de simulación de citas 'Celestia'. A pesar de haber aumentado al máximo la simpatía de todas las heroínas, no puede decidirse por una sola, lo que la lleva a pasar días de angustia sin poder avanzar al evento de confesión. En ese momento, una explosión junto con una estrella fugaz ocurre en su casa, y cuando abre los ojos, se encuentra con la heroína principal de 'Celestia', Sofía...

"Machino... siempre quise decirlo... me gustas."

¡La comedia romántica de harén de invocación a otro mundo comienza con las heroínas de alta simpatía que han saltado al mundo real!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.ja: ロゥブルーの標本

description.en: The heart of every living being hardens and remains after the body dies. One day, the traveling merchant Faris found a girl who had collapsed in the desert and took her under his care. The girl, who introduced herself as Eva, was told by Faris about their current location, the oasis city 'Aurof,' and he took her to the town to show her around. As they walked through the merchant city lined with villas, Eva gradually began to open up to Faris and confessed, 'I ran away from that house.' Thus begins the story of a girl carrying a 'forbidden secret.

title.en: Mobile Fighter G Gundam Side Story: Tower of Death

altTitles.ja: 機動武闘伝Gガンダム外伝: タワー•オブ•デス

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Butouden Jii Gandamu: Tawaa obu Desu

description.en:
A G Gundam one-shot published in the 1994 winter vacation issue of "Comic Bom Bom".

Domon and Rain arrive in a small country on their search for Domon's older brother and the Devil Gundam.

There they find out about the legend of a sacred tower told to grant happiness. However, this tower could instead appear as the "Tower of Death", which will lead any who see it to their end!

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Warui ga Watashi wa Yuri ja nai

altTitles.en: Sorry, but I’m Not into Yuri

altTitles.ja: 悪いが私は百合じゃない

altTitles.zh: 虽然很抱歉但我不是百合

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然很抱歉但我不是百合

altTitles.zh-ro: Suīrán hěn bàoqiàn dàn wǒ bùshì bǎihé

description.en: In an attempt to win her homeroom teacher's heart, Itsumi Toudou purchased a shady love potion, and tested it out on her stuck-up student committee president, Yomotsuka. Now, she has an uncharacteristically affectionate girl to deal with, and she's not even a lesbian! Right?
description.es: Em uma tentativa de ganhar o coração de seu professor de sala de aula, Itsumi Toudou comprou uma poção do amor sombria e a testou em sua presunçosa presidente do comitê estudantil, Yomotsuka. Agora, ela tem uma garota estranhamente afetuosa para lidar, e ela nem é lésbica! Certo?
description.ja: 担任の男性教師に恋をしている藤堂いつみは、ある日いけないサイトで惚れ薬を入手し、担任に飲ませようとする。しかし、真面目で堅苦しい美人学級委員長やヤンキー女子に飲まれてしまったから、さあ大変！
description.pt-br: Numa tentativa de conquistar o coração de seu professor, Itsumi Toudou comprou uma poção do amor suspeita e a testou em Yomotsuka, a presidente do conselho estudantil. Agora, ela tem de lidar com uma menina estranhamente afetuosa, e aquela nem sequer é lésbica! Ou será que não?

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

description.en: Shin Yoomyeong is an unknown actor who kept on chasing his dream despite playing minor roles for 15 years because of his weak presence. One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious…

altTitles.ja: Dジェネシス ダンジョンが出来て3年

altTitles.en: D Genesis: Three Years Since the Dungeon Appeared

description.en:
Three years after monster-infested dungeons start appearing on Earth due to an American experiment gone awry, anonymous researcher Keigo Yoshimara strikes gold when he accidentally kills a creature. This earns him a magical “D-Card” and a mysterious skill that allows him to see RPG-style stats.

Deciding to quit his job and go into dungeon diving, Keigo seeks the assistance of his highly knowledgeable colleague, Azusa Miyoshi, to help him conquer the dungeon exploration market and make millions. But it’s a face to obtain all the treasure and magic he can before the masses amount of government agencies and like-minded explorers take it first.

No one said getting rich would be easy!

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/d-genesis)

altTitles.en: Bowblade Swordsman: Descendants of the Bowblade
Archer Sword God: Descendants of the Archer

description.en: Eulji So Moon has aged well and is now a grandfather. He orders his mischievous grandson to go on a joyful trip to Zhongyuan! To save the fallen Namgung family clan and help them spread their wings once more, Eulji Ho’s journey starts now!!

altTitles.ja: 理香さん、結婚してください！

title.en: The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: After Transmigration, I Turned an Icy Chief to Become Tsundere

altTitles.en: After Transmigration, I Turned an Icy Grand Assistant to Become Tsundere
After Transmigration, I Turned an Icy Grand Secretariat to Become Tsundere

altTitles.zh: 穿书后我把高冷首辅变傲娇了

description.en: Accidentally dressed as a woman and disguised as a man as a grandson, do you have to recharge to continue life? The bound power bank is still a deadly enemy! Such a wonderful setting is really unacceptable, but in order to survive, I can only force it!
The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

title.en: Makikomarete Isekai Teni suru Yatsu wa, Taitei Cheat

altTitles.ja: 巻き込まれて異世界転移する奴は、大抵チート

altTitles.ko: 휘말려서 이세계 전이하는 녀석은 대개 치트

altTitles.en: Those Who Get Caught Up in Another World are Usually Cheaters
He is a Matchless Warrior in Different-Dimension World!!

description.en:
One day during lunch break, High School student Takanashi Kyousai and four friends are suddenly transported to another world of Swords and Magic. The Princess of the Other World,  who was the Time-Space Magician that summoned them, wants them to be Heroes and defeat the Demon King to save her world. 

While his four friends were taken aback by this sudden turn of events, Kyousai was calm and said, "It's just like a story". However the Princess made a shocking statement: 

"I only summoned four Heroes, didn't I?" 

What fate awaits Kyousai, the man who was accidentally summoned to another world?

---
description.ja: ある日の昼休み、突然 4人の友人とともに剣と魔術の異世界へと転移してしまった男子高校生・小鳥遊強斎。彼らを召喚した時空魔術師である異世界の王女によれば、この世界を救うため「勇者」として魔王を倒して欲しいとのこと。突然のことに面食らう友人 4人をよそに「テンプレじゃん」とひとり余裕の表情の強斎だったが……、ここで王女から驚愕の事実が告げられる!「――勇者様は4人のはずですが?」“間違って異世界に召喚されてしまった男" 強斎の運命やいかに!?

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.ja: 私の推しは悪役令嬢。

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

altTitles.ja: となりの黒川さん
My Neighbor Ms.Kurokawa

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret. 

This awkward duo weaves a sweet and tangy youth romantic comedy that will make you grin!
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼

title.en: Kimi no Tame no Curtain Call

altTitles.ja: 君のためのカーテンコール

description.en:
Akutsu Sakura, a wallflower with no self-esteem to speak of, and Hiiragi Tsubame, a girl brimming with confidence and dignity. The meeting between these two polar opposites marks the start of their adolescence. 

A high school drama exploring façades and what lie beneath them, and the difference between imitations and the real thing.

altTitles.ja: 異世界居酒屋｢げん｣

description.en:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as fallen monks, warriors, noble female knight, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

description.en: UPDATES EVERY THURSDAY — Lose your mind one way or another. It’s 2070 on a planet not so far off from Earth. After a major earthquake, radioactive material has overcome almost all the land. Inhabitants must now find a way to live with the immensely destructive waste. Will you join the army, traffic for the cartel, or overwork yourself to death?
